General.Name: Vegano Foods Inc.
General.Description: Vegano Foods Inc., a beverage company, engages creating oat milk that is dairy-free, glutenfree, nut-free, and plant-based. It focuses on the health beverage market segment. The company was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1040 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4H1

1.Name: Mr. Alexander  McAulay BBA, C.A., C.P.A., CA, CPA
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer
